How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: ‚ÄúMy Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod‚Äù folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: ‚ÄúMy Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod‚Äù folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: PETERBILT 352 v3.0 1.50.x ETS2
item.description:
PETERBILT 352 v3.0 1.50.x ETS2

FULL version includes:
Chassis long.
Chassis 3 axis.
Chassis 3 axis lift.
Cummins engines.
Truck in traffic (day & standard cabin).
Stoneguard.
Exhaust smoke (optional).
Light lashes.
Cabin air conditioning system.
Big wing.
More bumper models.
Truck in quick Jobs (normal, heavy & oversize).
Truck in truck browser.
Metallic paints collection.

PETERBILT 352 v3.0 (ETS2 1.50.x):
Updated to ETS2 1.50.x.
Windows are openable but not visible by interior (only sound effect).
A lot of corrections.
Fixed GPS.
Fixed beacons.
Fixed dashboard.
Fixed mirrors.
Fixed cabin lights.
Added Stoneguard (only in FULL version).
Added few wings models (Big only in FULL version).
Added front lights lashes (only in FULL version).
Added backpanel accessories.
Added bed accessories.
Metallic paints collection (only in FULL version).
Added A/A system.
You need SiS‚ÄôL megapack to have all the cabin accessories available.

Clean gamelog!!
Please inform about bugs/errors. Thank you.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: ‚ÄúMy Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod‚Äù folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: ‚ÄúMy Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod‚Äù folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
